title: cumin potatoes
description: This delicious slow-cooked pork dish with garlicky potatoes is both Moorish in style and moreish in nature.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 10oz pigs' cheeks, preferably Ibérico pork or Gloucestershire Old Spot, trimmed of fat and sinew
750ml/1¼ pints good-quality beef or dark-chicken stock
700g/1lb 8oz waxy potatoes such as Desirée potatoes, peeled, cut into cubes
1 slice crusty white bread, crusts removed, cut into chunks
small handful fresh flatleaf parsley leaves
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
